string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_ROBE1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use equipamentos Cloth e aumenta sua defesa sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_SEMI_ROBE1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to wear semi-cloth equipment, and boosts your defence each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_HIGH_LEATHER1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use equipamentos Leather e aumenta sua defesa sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_PLATE1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use equipamentos Plate e aumenta sua defesa sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_BOW1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use Arcos e aumenta seu poder de ataque sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_BOOK1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use Livro de Feitiços e aumenta seu poder de ataque sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_SWORD1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use armas de uma mão e aumenta seu poder de ataque sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_SCIMITAR1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use scimitars, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_Gloves1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use gloves, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_CLAW1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use claws, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_POLEARM1_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use Foice e aumenta seu poder de ataque sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MASTERY_DUAL_DESC
string.body: Permite que você use duas armas de uma mão simultaneamente e aumenta seu poder de ataque sempre que o nível de habilidade aumenta.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PowerBlow_DESC
string.body: Gathers power and attacks the enemy with a powerful swing of the weapon.

string.name: STR_SKILL_ClashingHoly_DESC
string.body: Attacks an enemy with a ball of earth magic. It can inflict additional damage when used against a stumbled enemy.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Tornado_DESC
string.body: Creates a strong blast of wind around the target, attacking all enemies within the area of effect. It also slows the movement speed of enemies.

string.name: STR_SKILL_IceStorm_DESC
string.body: Creates a storm of ice around you, attacking all nearby enemies.

string.name: STR_FORESTRY_DESC
string.body: A habilidade de cortar árvores ou colher ervas.

string.name: STR_GATHERING_DESC
string.body: A habilidade de colher frutas, legumes e grãos.

string.name: STR_BLACKSMITH_DESC
string.body: A habilidade de criar itens de metal.

string.name: STR_COOKING_DESC
string.body: Permite preparar alimentos e bebidas que adicionam efeitos quando consumidos. Você também pode purificar materiais contaminados.

string.name: STR_ARMORSMITH_DESC
string.body: Permite criar armaduras de metal, capacetes e escudos.

string.name: STR_TAILORING_DESC
string.body: Permite fazer armaduras Cloth, armaduras Leather e fantasias com tecido e couro.

string.name: STR_LEATHERWORK_DESC
string.body: A habilidade de criar itens Leather.

string.name: STR_CARPENTRY_DESC
string.body: A habilidade de criar itens de madeira.

string.name: STR_ALCHEMY_DESC
string.body: Permite fazer itens que aprimoram várias armas, itens e equipamentos mágicos.

string.name: STR_HANDIWORK_DESC
string.body: Permite criar metais preciosos, armas de madeira e peças pequenas.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stun_DESC
string.body: Você foi atingido pelo choque. Você não pode fazer nada por um período de tempo.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Death_DESC
string.body: Um efeito colateral temporário da morte, que diminui a Velocidade de Movimento por um curto período de tempo.

string.name: STR_SKILL_TauntingBlow_DESC
string.body: Provoca um inimigo com um ataque leve.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SlicingBlow_DESC
string.body: Inflige um corte profundo. Se a habilidade for bem sucedida, você pode usar Stunning Blow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_StunningBlow_DESC
string.body: Um ataque forte que força o inimigo a tropeçar (stumble). Disponível somente após Slicing Blow ser bem sucedido.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCFAIMAMHOWL_DESC
string.body: Paralisa o inimigo e impede todas as ações.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCZOMBIEBITE_DESC
string.body: Envenena o alvo e lentamente diminui seu HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCTAILATTACK_DESC
string.body: Envenena o alvo e lentamente diminui seu HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCACIDSPIT_DESC
string.body: A Velocidade de Movimento é reduzida.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCHARDSHELL_DESC
string.body: Envolve seu corpo com uma concha para bloquear ataques inimigos.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCORCHISHBERSERK_DESC
string.body: Enters the Berserk mode, which increases your attack power but decreases your defence.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCORCHISHFOCUS_DESC
string.body: Boosts your concentration to raise the chance of critical strikes.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCSHADOWBLADE_DESC
string.body: Collapses the target's stance, preventing it from taking any action.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCMIMICPRESS_DESC
string.body: The target continues to bleed and slowly loses HP.

string.name: STR_Skill_DownwardBlow_DESC
string.body: Um golpe para baixo em um inimigo caído. Pode ser usado apenas contra um inimigo caído (stumbled).

string.name: STR_Skill_ShieldBash_DESC
string.body: Golpeia com o escudo e atordoa (stagger) o inimigo. Disponível somente após um Block bem-sucedido.

string.name: STR_Skill_MultipleBlow_DESC
string.body: Acerta o inimigo repetidamente e desfere um golpe feroz para acabar com ele.

string.name: STR_Skill_Rage_DESC
string.body: Diminui sua defesa por um curto período de tempo para aumentar a capacidade de ataque.

string.name: STR_Skill_TripleEdge1_DESC
string.body: Corta o inimigo rapidamente. A primeira habilidade sequência Triple Edge.

string.name: STR_Skill_TripleEdge2_DESC
string.body: Corta um inimigo para infligir uma ferida profunda. A segunda habilidade da sequência Triple Edge.

string.name: STR_Skill_TripleEdge3_DESC
string.body: Acerta um ataque crítico no inimigo ferido para atordoá-lo (stagger). A terceira habilidade da sequência Triple Edge.

string.name: STR_Skill_BreathBreaker_DESC
string.body: Ataca um inimigo caído para acabar com ele. Pode ser usado apenas contra um inimigo caído (stumbled).

string.name: STR_Skill_RipostingEdge_DESC
string.body: Ataca um ponto vulnerável e faz o inimigo cair (stumble). Disponível somente após o Parry ser bem-sucedido.

string.name: STR_Skill_RapidShot_DESC
string.body: Você rapidamente atira várias flechas no oponente.

string.name: STR_Skill_EntangleShot_DESC
string.body: Ataca as pernas do inimigo para diminuir sua Velocidade de Movimento.

string.name: STR_Skill_WolfClaw_DESC
string.body: Concentrates your effort on inflicting a critical strike. Your accuracy decreases while you are concentrating.

string.name: STR_Skill_BindCircle_DESC
string.body: Amarra (bind) e imobiliza todos os inimigos dentro de um raio do alvo.

string.name: STR_Skill_Regeneration_DESC
string.body: Restaura lentamente o HP do alvo durante um período de tempo.

string.name: STR_Skill_Protection_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a defesa física do alvo por um período de tempo para protegê-lo de ataques inimigos.

string.name: STR_Skill_WindSpear_DESC
string.body: Lança uma lança de magia de vento no inimigo. Se a habilidade for bem-sucedida, você pode usar Explosion.

string.name: STR_Skill_Explosion_DESC
string.body: Ataca os ferimentos vulneráveis do inimigo e o faz cair (stumble). Disponível somente após o Scream of Wind Soul ser bem-sucedido.

string.name: STR_Skill_FireShard_DESC
string.body: Ataca o inimigo com uma adaga de fogo.

string.name: STR_Skill_MarbleFlame_DESC
string.body: Lança uma poderosa bola de fogo no inimigo.

string.name: STR_Skill_LightningProphecy_DESC
string.body: Invoca um raio para atacar o inimigo.

string.name: STR_Skill_ManaRegeneration_DESC
string.body: Aumenta sua taxa de Recuperação de Mana por um período de tempo.

string.name: STR_Skill_DPATK1_DESC
string.body: Reúne o poder da luz sagrada e a detona para destruir todos os inimigos próximos. Depois de lançar a habilidade, você perde todos a DP.

string.name: STR_Skill_DPHeal_DESC
string.body: Envia seu poder de luz para um aliado que está reunindo o poder da luz sagrada. Seu DP é totalmente transferido para o aliado. Uma vez usado, o DP nunca é devolvido.

string.name: STR_Skill_JumpBlow_DESC
string.body: Pula para atacar o inimigo e o derruba.

string.name: STR_Skill_SpinBlow_DESC
string.body: Um forte ataque giratório que atordoa (stagger) os inimigos próximos.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_HP_01_DESC
string.body: Lentamente recupera HP durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_HP_02_DESC
string.body: Lentamente recupera HP durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_MP_01_DESC
string.body: Lentamente recupera MP durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_MP_02_DESC
string.body: Lentamente recupera MP durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_STR_VIT_01_DESC
string.body: Aumenta STR e VIT durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_STR_VIT_02_DESC
string.body: Aumenta STR, mas diminui VIT durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_AGI_DEX_01_DESC
string.body: Aumenta AGI e DEX durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_AGI_DEX_02_DESC
string.body: Aumenta AGI, mas diminui DEX durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_KNO_WIL_01_DESC
string.body: Aumenta KNO e WIL durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_KNO_WIL_02_DESC
string.body: Aumenta KNO, mas diminui WIL durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_MUSHROOM_01_DESC
string.body: Aumenta as Velocidades de Movimento e Ataque durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_MUSHROOM_02_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Precisão e a Evasão durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_MUSHROOM_03_DESC
string.body: Aumenta significativamente os Ataques Físicos e Mágicos durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_EARTH_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Resistência à Terra durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_WATER_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Resistência à Água durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_FIRE_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Resistência à Fogo durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_AIR_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Resistência à Vento durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_LIGHTNESS_DESC
string.body: Aumenta o Ataque Mágico durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_DARKNESS_DESC
string.body: Aumenta o Ataque Físico durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_ACCURACY_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Precisão durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_DODGE_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Evasão durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_CRITICAL_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a chance de acertos críticos durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_SPEED_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Velocidade de Movimento durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_HASTE_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Velocidade de Ataque durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_GALL_WORM_DESC
string.body: Aumenta STR significativamente durante sua duração.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_GEM_SHINING_DESC
string.body: Restaura uma quantidade significativa de MP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_POTION_HP_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Restaura uma pequena quantidade de HP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_POTION_MP_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Restaura uma pequena quantidade de MP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_HERB_ANGELICA_DESC
string.body: Restaura uma pequena quantidade de HP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_HERB_TARRAGON_DESC
string.body: Restaura uma pequena quantidade de MP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_HERB_GINSENG_DESC
string.body: Restaura pequenas quantidades de HP e MP.

string.name: STR_Skill_StumbleStun_DESC
string.body: Você caiu após receber um forte choque. Você não pode fazer nada por um período de tempo.

string.name: STR_Skill_Guard_DESC
string.body: Levanta o escudo e se prepara para o ataque inimigo.

string.name: STR_SYSTEM_SKILL_POLYMORPH_FUNGUS_DESC
string.body: Você se tornou temporariamente um Fungen.

string.name: STR_Skill_StunningImpact_DESC
string.body: Sacode o chão e derruba (stumble) inimigos próximos. Se a habilidade for bem-sucedida, você pode usar Chastise e Earth Impact.

string.name: STR_Skill_Chastisement_DESC
string.body: Invoca uma Luminary Dagger para causar dano aos inimigos próximos e reduzir suas Velocidades de Ataque. Disponível apenas após o sucesso do Stunning Impact.

string.name: STR_Skill_Ward_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a defesa física do alvo por um período de tempo para protegê-lo de ataques inimigos.

string.name: STR_Skill_BasicShock_DESC
string.body: Dá um pequeno choque no inimigo para atordoá-lo (stagger).

string.name: STR_SKILL_BattleMaster_DESC
string.body: Aumenta seu HP máximo, ataques físicos e mágicos, dependendo do nível da habilidade.

string.name: STR_Skill_ClashingImpact_DESC
string.body: Convoca o poder da terra para infligir grandes danos ao inimigo. Disponível apenas após o sucesso do Stunning Impact.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_01
string.body: Maximum Flight Time Increase Test Scroll 1

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_02
string.body: Maximum Flight Time Increase Test Scroll 2

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_01_DESC
string.body: Increases maximum flying time by 20 seconds for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_02_DESC
string.body: Increases maximum flying time by 50 percent for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYCOOLTIME_01_DESC
string.body: Reduces Flying cooldown time by 5 minutes.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYCOOLTIME_02_DESC
string.body: Reduces Flying cooldown time by 50 percent.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_REBIRTH_DESC
string.body: Automatically resurrects you if you die while the spell is in effect.

string.name: STR_Skill_Spin_DESC
string.body: Você girou para trás após receber um forte choque. Você não pode fazer nada por um período de tempo.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustHit_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Aumenta a Provocação do alvo contra você. Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] de dano adicional se o alvo é um Balaur. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_AvengingCrash_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] de dano físico no alvo após um Block bem sucedido e deixa o alvo em choque (stun) temporatiamente. Aumenta a Provocação do alvo contra você. Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] de dano adicional se o alvo é um Balaur. Requer um Escudo

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustBlow_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Ferocious Strike – Robust Blow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_BlowHateUp_DESC
string.body: Ataca o alvo com dano físico e aumenta a Provocação do alvo contra você.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_Provoke_G1_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Provocação de um alvo que está até [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m de distância de você.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_AssaultStabber_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo, e causa [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] de dano físico adicional se for usado nas costas do alvo.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_BlowBleed_DESC
string.body: Physical Attack + Bleeding Strikes a target and causes it to bleed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftEdge_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftShock_G1_DESC

Water Spirit: Magical Water Strike Wind Spirit: Magical Wind Strike Earth Spirit: Magical Earth Strike Fire Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Magma Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Tempest Spirit: Magical Wind Strike.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Pet_DefencePosition_G2_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Spirits have skills that boost their resist magic.
Water Spirit: Increases Physical and Resist Magics (weak) Wind Spirit: Increases Physical and Resist Magics and Evasion (strong) Earth Spirit: Increases Physical and Resist Magics (strong) Fire Spirit: Increases Physical and Resist Magics (weak)

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_Assail_G2_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Each spirit has an element-specific ranged strike skill that has a chance to cause an altered state.
Water Spirit: Causes the state of silence. Wind Spirit: Causes the state of bleeding. Earth Spirit: Causes the state of stun. Fire Spirit: Causes the strike effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Enfeeblement_G1_DESC
string.body: Reduces the attack speed of target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius for [%e1.Slow.RemainTime]. Increases targets casting time for magical skills and decreases [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value]. This effect can be removed with Dispel Magical Buff or Dispel Magical Debuff skills. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_CrushShot_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_GaiaEdge_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignetChain_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_EmergencyShield_G1_DESC
string.body: Forms a protective shield for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] that has a [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to absorb damage when a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m is subject to [%e1.Shield.Condition]. The protective shield remains effective until it absorbs a total of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_BlessofHealth_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_RapidRegeneration_G2_DESC

Commands the spirit to use its boost skills. Spirits have skills that boost their stats.
Water Spirit: Increases Physical and Magical Attacks and Magic Boost Wind Spirit: Increases Critical Hit Success Rate and Attack Speed Earth Spirit: Increases Physical and Magical Attacks and Magic Boost and creates Protective Shield Fire Spirit: Increases Physical and Magical Attacks and Magic Boost Magma Spirit: Increases Physical and Magical Attacks and Magic Boost Tempest Spirit: Increases Critical Hit Success Rate and Attack speed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_ExplosionTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 4 Tripeed Fruits to set a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy comes within 5m of the trap, it explodes, causing damage to enemies within a 10m radius.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_SandstormTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Uses 3 Tripeed fruits to set up a ranged trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. It blinds a target within a 10m radius and lengthens the casting time of its magical skills. While the trap is active, the target gradually loses HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_SandstormTrap_G2_DESC
string.body: Uses 5 Tripeed Fruits to set a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy comes within 5m of the trap, it explodes, causing blindness, increased casting time, and gradual HP loss to a target within a 10m radius.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_ThornburstTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Uses 2 Tripeed fruits to set up a trap. Remaining effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], the trap reduces the movement speed of the enemy that approaches within a 5m radius and also causes it to bleed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_VacuumTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Uses 9 Tripeed branches to set up a trap. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. It inflicts magical wind damage on a target within a 5m radius and silences it.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Pet_ElementalShock_G1_DESC

Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Each spirit has an element-specific strike skill.
Water Spirit: Magical Water Strike Wind Spirit: Sustainable Magical Wind Strike Earth Spirit: Sustainable Magical Earth Strike Fire Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Magma Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Tempest Spirit: Magical Wind Strike

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_BackAssault_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo, and decreases its [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. It inflicts additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage if dealt behind the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Blindside_G2_DESC
string.body: Jumps behind a target's back within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to inflict [%e1.MoveBehindATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.MoveBehindATK.MaxDamage] physical damage. May also stun it. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Blindside_G2_Abnormal
string.body: You are stunned. You can't use physical skills or items, and you can't move or attack.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignetChain_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and engraves a signet pattern on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Rune Carve – Sigil Strike Stigma acquired

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignetChain_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and engraves a signet pattern on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Rune Carve – Sigil Strike Stigma acquired

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DimensionImage_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DimensionImage_G1_Abnormal

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FrontAssault_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. If the skill is used in front of the target, it inflicts additional damage on the target and causes it to spin. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HeavensEdge_G1_DESC
string.body: Detonates the Runes carved on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging and putting the target in the [%e1.SignetBurst.AddEffect] state.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HeavensEdge_G2_DESC
string.body: Detonates the Runes carved on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging and putting the target in the [%e1.SignetBurst.AddEffect] state.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HellsBlade_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target immobilized in mid-air, and then knocks it out of the sky.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HellsBlade_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target immobilized in mid-air, and then knocks it out of the sky.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_MindsEye_G1_DESC

string.body: You can see targets in basic stealth.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_MindsEye_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetAssault_G1_DESC

Water Spirit: Increases Magical Accuracy and Resist Magic Wind Spirit: Increases Accuracy and Evasion Rate Earth Spirit: Restores HP and cures Physical and Mental Altered States Fire Spirit: Increases Physical Attack and reflects damage Magma Spirit: Restores HP and increases Physical Attack Tempest Spirit: Increases Magical Accuracy, Resist Magic, Accuracy and Evasion Rate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SpikeTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 5 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy approaches within a 5m radius, it explodes to immobilize the enemy as well as to reduce its evasion rate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_ParalyzeArrow_G2_DESC
string.body: Forces a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to fall asleep for [%e1.Sleep.RemainTime]. However, the target's [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value]. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_ParalyzeArrow_G2_Abnormal
string.body: You are sleeping, and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] has increased by [%e2.StatUp.Value].

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_DimissPolymorph_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical wind damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, and deals additional [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage if the target is a spirit. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_SympatheticSwitch_G2_DESC
string.body: You draw the Enmity of a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m that is currently focused on your spirit. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_ElementalFist_G2_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Each type of spirit has an element-specific ranged attack with a chance to produce additional effects.
Earth Spirit: Reduces Earth Resist Water Spirit: Reduces Water Resist Fire Spirit: Reduces Fire Resist Wind Spirit: Reduces Wind Defence

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_EnchantmentBurst_G2_DESC
string.body: Removes up to [%e1.DispelBuffCounterATK.DispelCount] buffs from the target and inflicts [%e1.DispelBuffCounterATK.Damage] damage for the first buff removed, as well as a further [%e1.DispelBuffCounterATK.AddDamage] damage for each additional buff removed. Receive Stigmas

string.name: STR_GNAS_DotDelaySpell_Nr_DESC
string.body: Starts with a little continuing damage and inflicts massive damage at the end with a delayed magical attack.

string.name: STR_GNAS_SatkApBleAdd_Nr_DESC
string.body: If the target is bleeding, its wound becomes aggravated and the continuing damage effect is added.

string.name: STR_GNAS_SatkChain1_Nr_DESC
string.body: The first attack of Chain Skill. Causes slight bleeding.

string.name: STR_GNAS_SatkChain2_Nr_DESC
string.body: The second attack of Chain Skill. It works in conjunction with the First Strike, and its effect is even greater.

string.name: STR_GNAS_SatkChain3_Nr_DESC
string.body: Inflicts significant damage and causes Stun and Bleeding.

string.name: STR_GNAS_Spin_Front_DESC
string.body: Spins the target to face it the other way.

string.body: When fighting a debuffed enemy, you receive healing from the enemy. – provoker

string.name: STR_GNCH_MagicCounterATK_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNFI_Pullup_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNFI_SKnockdown_Nr_DESC
string.body: Inflicts more damage on a knocked down target.

string.name: STR_GNGR_Dispel_Dot_DESC
string.body: Heals the altered state of you or your ally.

string.name: STR_GNKN_ArDamDisSDatdelSnare_Nr_DESC
string.body: Lowers the amount of damage received and cancels all dispels, but decreases the attack and movement speeds.

string.name: STR_GNKN_Protect_Nr_DESC
string.body: Casts Protect on the target so the caster receives damage intended for the target.

string.name: STR_GNKN_SatkSDPydefDodge_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNKN_SatkSDPydefDodgeSA_Nr_DESC
string.body: Inflicts damage and weakens overall physical properties.

string.name: STR_GNKN_SKnockBackSA_DESC

string.name: STR_GNKN_SUpHPSUpPyatt_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNKN_SUpPyattSDownHP_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNMA_SpellLongLr_Nr_DESC
string.body: A long-range magical skill of mages

string.name: STR_GNPR_ShieldSUpHPPydef_Nr_DESC
string.body: Boosts magic defence, Max_HP and physical defence of those within the area of effect.

string.name: STR_GNPR_SUpPyattSDoMaatt_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNRA_KnockBackMiddle_Na_DESC

string.name: STR_GNRA_SatkTALong_Nr_DESC
string.body: A long-range physical skill that inflicts damage on those within the area of effect. The skill inflicts more damage on the bleeding targets.

string.name: STR_GNSC_StunSA_Nr_DESC
string.body: Stuns those within the area of effect.

string.name: STR_GNWA_KnockBack_Na_DESC
string.body: Pushes the enemy away to block its next attack.

string.name: STR_GNWI_DotDelaySpell_Fire_Sp_DESC
string.body: Starts with a little continuing damage and inflicts massive damage at the end with a delayed magical attack.

string.name: STR_GNWI_Reflector_Nr_DESC
string.body: Reflects a part of the received damage back to the enemy.

string.name: STR_GNWI_SpellDotSnare_Water_DESC
string.body: An ice attack that inflicts freezing continuing damage damage on the targets within the area of effect and snares them.

string.name: STR_GNWI_SpellKDLong_Air_DESC
string.body: Shoves a target that is far away.

string.name: STR_GNWI_SpellKDSA_Nr_DESC
string.body: An emergency skill used to inflict magical damage on the targets within the area of effect and briefly knock them back.

string.name: STR_GNWI_SpellSlience_Water_DESC
string.body: Inflicts magical damage on and silences the target.

string.name: STR_NAS_SatkApBleAdd_Nr_DESC
string.body: If the target is bleeding, its wound becomes aggravated and the continuing damage effect is added.

string.name: STR_NAS_Silence_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NEL_SummonEL_Pretor_DESC

string.name: STR_NFI_SatkchainKnock_Brownie_DESC
string.body: A skill used as a knockdown Chain Skill.

string.name: STR_NGR_Snare_Nr_DESC
string.body: A melee attack that significantly lowers the target's movement speed. The actual damage inflicted is little.

string.name: STR_NRA_BleedKDLrMiddle_Nr_DESC
string.body: A long-range attack which inflicts diminished damage but causes significant bleeding.

string.name: STR_NRA_BleedLrMiddle_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NRA_StunSDownDefMd_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NSC_StunSA_Nr_DESC
string.body: Stuns those within the area of effect.

string.name: STR_NWA_KnockBack_Poi_DESC
string.body: Pushes the enemy away to block its next attack.

string.name: STR_NWA_KnockBack_Nor_DESC
string.body: Pushes the enemy away to block its next attack.

string.name: STR_NCH_SatkStunAdd_Po_DESC

string.name: STR_NAS_Spin_Front_DESC
string.body: Spins the target to face it the other way.

string.body: You are blinded, the skill casting time has increased and your HP is decreasing gradually.

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_ThornburstTrap_G1_Abnormal
string.body: You are bleeding, and your movement speed has decreased. You can remove altered states by using physical healing magic or potion.

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_ThornburstTrap_G2_Abnormal
string.body: You are bleeding, and your movement speed has decreased. You can remove altered states by using physical healing magic or potion.

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_ShockTrap_G1_Abnormal

string.name: STR_NWA_SUpPyAttShortBlind_Nr_DESC_Abnormal
string.body: You are blinded, the movement speed has decreased and your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] has increased. You can remove the altered states by using physical healing magic or potions.

string.name: STR_NGR_BlindSlow_Scream_DESC
string.body: Due to a bloodcurdling scream, the attack speed and accuracy have been temporarily reduced.

string.name: STR_NGR_BlindSlow_Scream_Abnormal
string.body: You are blinded, and your movement speed has decreased. You can remove altered states by using physical healing magic or potion.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_PandemoniumDrain_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_CeletialImage_G1_DESC
string.body: Enables you to completely evade physical attacks for [%e1.AlwaysDodge.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_PandemoniumProtect_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%%, [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]%%, and [%e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_CeletialBarrier_G1_DESC
string.body: Forms a protective shield that lasts [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] and has a [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to absorb damage when you receive [%e1.Shield.Condition]. The protective shield absorbs [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage each time and remains effective until it absorbs a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_CeletialBarrier_G1_Abnormal
string.body: Each time you are subject to [%e1.Shield.Condition], you suffer less damage when attacked.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_PandemoniumRegrowth_G1_DESC
string.body: Restores your HP by [%e1.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e1.Heal.CheckTime] for [%e1.Heal.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_CeletialOdd_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_PandemoniumFocus_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_PandemoniumFocus_G1_Abnormal
string.body: You can use skills without spending MP, and the casting speed has been increased.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_RaceAddedDamage
string.body: SkillATK_Instant Race Check Additional Damage Test(41~50)

string.name: STR_GNFI_SKDownSDownPydef_Nr_DESC
string.body: Reduces the defence of those within the area of effect.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SKILL_Q_OkaruTree_Poison_DESC
string.body: Inflict [%e1.Poison.Damage] damage on a target every [%e1.Poison.CheckTime] for [%e1.Poison.RemainTime] by poisoning it, and decreases its movement speed.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SKILL_Q_OkaruTree_Poison_Abnormal
string.body: You are poisoned, and your movement speed has decreased. You suffer damage continuously for a period of time.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_BackAssault_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo, and decreases its [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. It inflicts additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage if dealt behind the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_BlindingBurst_G2_DESC
string.body: Blinds the nearby enemies within a 15m radius of you for [%e1.Blind.RandomTime]~[%e1.Blind.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Blindside_G3_DESC
string.body: Jumps behind a target's back within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to inflict [%e1.MoveBehindATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.MoveBehindATK.MaxDamage] physical damage. May also stun it. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignet_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and has a chance to carve a rune on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignetChain_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and engraves a signet pattern on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Rune Carve – Sigil Strike Stigma acquired

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CorruptingCut_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]-[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and an additional [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage if the target takes poison damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DarknessIllusion_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo and deals an additional random damage if used on its back.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DashAttack_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.DashATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.DashATK.MaxDamage] physical damage by dashing to the target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DeadlyCounter_G1_DESC
string.body: Upon success of Parry, Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FlashBomb_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on enemies around a selected spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you, and also blinds them.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FlowingSpiner_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]-[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and puts it in the [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect] state while you are in evasion status.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FrontAssault_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. If the skill is used in front of the target, it inflicts additional damage on the target and causes it to spin. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_GamblersIntention_G1_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.RemainTime], increases the critical strike chance of your [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.BoostCount]th attack skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HeavensEdge_G3_DESC
string.body: Detonates the Runes carved on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging and putting the target in the [%e1.SignetBurst.AddEffect] state.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HellsBlade_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target immobilized in mid-air, and then knocks it out of the sky.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_PoisoningIntention_G4_DESC
string.body: Uses 4 Scolopen Poison to spread poison on a weapon. For [%e1.Provoker.RemainTime] each attack has a [%e1.Provoker.ConditionProb]%% chance of poisoning the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_ShadowWalk_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetAssault_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and engraves a signet pattern on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Habilidade de Sequência nível 3 Soul Slash – Rune Slash

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetImolation_G1_DESC
string.body: Erases the Pattern engraved on the target up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging the target. Additionally it deals continuous damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetNova_G1_DESC
string.body: Detonates the Runes carved on a target up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SilentDagger_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo and silences it.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SpectralMirrior_G1_DESC
string.body: Resists up to [%e1.AlwaysResist.Count] magical attacks for [%e1.AlwaysResist.RemainTime]. But [%e2.StatDown.StatName] also decreases as a side effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SpectralWalk_G1_DESC
string.body: Removes the effect of poisoning, bleeding and continuous damage from yourself, and you enter the advanced hide state without affecting the movement speed for [%e2.Hide.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_StrikingIntention_G3_DESC
string.body: Boosts the effect of the next [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillAttack.AttackType] by [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillAttack.BonusRate]%% for [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillAttack.RemainTime]. Also increases [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] for that period.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_VisiousEye_G2_DESC
string.body: Performs critical strike attacks up to [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.BoostCount] times for [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.RemainTime]. However, your [%e2.StatDown.StatName] decreases by [%e2.StatDown.Value].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_WindWalk_G2_DESC
string.body: You are in advanced stealth mode for [%e1.Hide.RandomTime] - [%e1.Hide.RemainTime]. Your movement speed is decreased during this time. You may use up to 3 magic buffs on yourself and still remain in stealth. Available during battle. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_WoundingSlash_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo, and aggravates damage of poisoning if it is poisoned already.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_ArcaneAftershock_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_FreeShot_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m that is immobilized in mid-air.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_HeavyShot_G4_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you to inflict random physical damage between [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] and [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage]. The target becomes temporarily stunned. Random damage multiplier: 0.5x, 1x and 2x the damage Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_ExplosionTrap_G4_DESC
string.body: Consumes 12 Tripeed Stems and sets up a ranged trap around you. The trap remains active for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime] and explodes when an enemy approaches. Its area of effect is within a 10m radius.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SandstormTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 5 Tripeed Fruits to set a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy comes within 5m of the trap, it explodes, causing blindness, increased casting time, and gradual HP loss to a target within a 10m radius.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_ShockTrap_G2_DESC
string.body: Uses 2 Tripeed saplings to set up a trap. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy approaches within a 5 meter radius it explodes to inflict damage on the enemy as well as to stun it if it is already blinded.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SpikeBiteTrap_G2_DESC
string.body: Uses 4 Tripeed fruits to set a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy comes within a 10m radius, it explodes, immobilizing the enemy and reducing its evasion.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SpikeTrap_G4_DESC
string.body: Uses 7 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy approaches within a 5m radius, it explodes to immobilize the enemy as well as to reduce its evasion rate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_ThornburstTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 3 Tripeed saplings to set up a trap. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and reduces the movement speed of the enemy that approaches within a 5m radius as well as causing it to bleed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_LongRangeShot_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_MarksmanMode_G2_DESC
string.body: [%e1.WeaponStatBoost.StatName] of [%e1.WeaponStatBoost.WeaponCategory] increases by [%e1.WeaponStatBoost.RateValue]%%. You move at a very low speed while the skill is in effect. Active Skill Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_MindEyeTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Sets a number of traps. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. It inflicts magical wind damage on a target within a 5m radius and causes it to bleed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_PhantomPhoenix_G1_DESC
string.body: Fires a firebird at the target to inflict [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_RootTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Sets a trap. The trap remains active for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy approaches within a 5 meter radius it inflicts continuing damage as well as immobilizing the enemy.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_SniperMode_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases the [%e1.WeaponStatBoost.StatName] and [%e2.WeaponStatBoost.StatName] of [%e1.WeaponStatBoost.WeaponCategory]. Active Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_SnipeShot_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m regardless of its evasion rate or resistance.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_SpiralArrow_G2_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius that has a low chance of inflicting [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage. Habilidade de Sequência nível 3 Arrow Strike – Spiral Arrow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_SpiralBlast_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. The target that is in the [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffectCondition] state receives an additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage and is put in the [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect] state.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_StoneShape_G1_DESC
string.body: Transforms you into a rock for [%e1.ShapeChange.RemainTime]. You can't move while the skill is in effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_TrapperMode_G1_DESC
string.body: Reduces your casting time of [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.SubType] by [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.CastingBonus]%% for [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_TrueShot_G4_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to inflict [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_WeedShape_G1_DESC
string.body: Transforms you into a weed for [%e1.ShapeChange.RemainTime]. You can't move while the skill is in effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_AssaultStabber_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo, e causa [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] de dano físico adicional se for usado nas costas do alvo.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_CounterSlash_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]-[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target after successful Evasion and has a chance of stunning it.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftEdge_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftShock_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Swift Edge – Soul Slash

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_WhisperofWind_G4_DESC
string.body: There is a high probability you evade [%e1.AlwaysDodge.Count] physical attacks for [%e1.AlwaysDodge.RemainTime] seconds.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_ArmorBreak_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] to [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target, and decreases its [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime] seconds. Aumenta a Provocação do alvo contra você. Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] de dano adicional se o alvo é um Balaur.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_AvengingCrash_G5_DESC
string.body: Upon success of Block, Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo by bashing it with the shield, and stuns it temporarily. Requer um Escudo Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_Provoke_G4_DESC
string.body: Aumenta a Provocação de um alvo que está até [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m de distância de você.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_Rage_G5_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime],[%e1.StatUp.StatName] is increased by [%e1.StatUp.Value] and you receive a protective shield which has a [%e2.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance of absorbing up to [%e2.Shield.ShieldValue] damage each time you receive [%e2.Shield.Condition]. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Ferocious Strike – Rage

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustBlow_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Habilidade de Sequência nível 2 Ferocious Strike – Robust Blow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustHit_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflige [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] de dano físico no alvo. Habilidade de Sequência nível 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AdvenceCast_G1_DESC
string.body: The casting time of [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.SubType] is shortened by [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.CastingBonus]%%.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AdvenceMagic_G1_DESC
string.body: The effects of magic skills are increased by [%e1.BoostSpellAttackEffect.EffectBonus1]%%.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AreaMagma_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on enemies in a 5m radius of a selected spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AreaTidal_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on enemies in a 5m radius of a selected spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_BurningFinger_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. If the target is stunned, the skill deals additional damage on it and increases its Enmity.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_BurningShield_G4_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Reflector.RemainTime], returns [%e1.Reflector.RateDamage] damage back to an enemy within [%e1.Reflector.MaxRange]m that [%e1.Reflector.Condition]s you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_CeletialPortal_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_CursedTree_G2_DESC
string.body: Transforms the target into a tree for [%e1.Deform.RemainTime]. The transformed target cannot move or act, and its [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases. Once the target is attacked, the effect disappears immediately. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Dark_FrostPillar_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_DelayedExplosion_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.Damage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, after a delay of [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.DelayedTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_FireShooter_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target immobilized in mid-air and within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_FlameCage_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_FrozenField_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] water damage on the enemies within a 15m radius of you, and immobilizes them for [%e2.Root.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_GainMana_G2_DESC
string.body: Instantly recovers your MP by [%e1.MPHeal_Instant.Heal] and then recovers [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTimeHeal] MP every [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTime] for [%e2.MPHeal.RemainTime]. While the skill is in effect, you fall asleep.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_GlacialSwam_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MagicFist_G3_DESC
string.body: Strikes down a target immobilized in mid-air that is within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you and inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MagmaBlazing_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MagmaExplosion_G1_DESC

string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you and on up to 6 enemies within a 5m radius of the target. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MysticShell_G3_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Shield.RemainTime], each time you receive [%e1.Shield.Condition], you can avoid up to [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage with the probability of [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% and recover your MP by [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_ElementalBind_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_Light_Avatar_G1_L_DESC
string.body: When you use 6 Seeds of Transformation, you transform into a Guardian General for [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.RemainTime]. During the transformation, almost every special status is removed, your HP recovers by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] and your MP by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e2.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal]. [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName] is increased by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value2], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value3], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.Value] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e3.StatUp.Value]. You deal additional damage to other characters.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Dark_Avatar_G1_L_Abnormal
string.body: You have transformed into a Guardian General. Increases [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value2], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value3], and [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.Value]. In addition, your movement and flight speeds have increased, you are resistant to all altered states. and you inflict additional damage to enemy players.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_Decaying_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Each spirit has a skill that inflicts element-specific sustainable damage on enemies, decreases their defence to the elements, and increases their item drop rate.
Water Spirit: Reduces Water Defence Wind Spirit: Reduces Wind Defence Earth Spirit: Reduces Earth Defence Fire Spirit: Reduces Fire Defence Magma Spirit: Reduces Fire and Earth Defences Tempest Spirit: Reduces Water and Wind Defences.

string.body: Fire resistance decreased. Item drop rate increased. Taking ongoing fire damage.

string.body: Fire and earth resistance decreased. Item drop rate increased. Taking ongoing fire damage.

string.body: Wind and water resistance decreased. Item drop rate increased. Taking ongoing wind damage.

string.name: STR_NPC_Order_Decaying_Water_Abnormal
string.body: Water resistance decreased. Item drop rate increased. Taking ongoing water damage.

Commands the spirit to attack. Each spirit has a skill that inflicts element-specific damage and a weakening effect.
Water Spirit: Water damage Wind Spirit: Stuns Earth Spirit: Absorbs some damage as HP Fire Spirit: Reduces physical defence Magma Spirit: Absorbs some damage as HP and reduces physical defence Tempest Spirit: Water damage and Stuns.

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_Order_ElementalField_Air_DESC
string.body: Increases the [%e1.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] of your allies within a 15m radius of the spirit by [%e1.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value] respectively for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_Order_ElementalField_Earth_DESC

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_Order_ElementalField_Fire_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Reflector.RemainTime], enables your allies within a 15 m radius of the spirit to reflect [%e1.Reflector.FixedDamage] damage to the target who attacks them, and increases [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]%%.

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_Order_ElementalField_Magma_DESC
string.body: Restores the HP of your allies within a 15m radius of the spirit by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and also increases [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e2.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_Order_ElementalField_Tempest_DESC

string.name: STR_NPC_SKILL_Order_ElementalField_Water_DESC

string.body: Stigma skill of an Ancient Daeva. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Stigma_Order_EtherEmission_G1_DESC
string.body:
A Stigma Skill of the Ancestral Daevas. Orders the spirit to attack, which uses its HP. Every spirit has an element-specific attack skill with a wide area of effect. This deals additional damage to Asmodians and Balaur. Stigma Skill
Water Spirit: Magical Water Attack Wind Spirit: Magical Wind Attack Earth Spirit: Magical Earth Attack Cinder Spirit: Magical Fire Attack Storm Spirit: Magical Water Attack

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Stigma_Order_EtherImpact_G1_DESC

Commands the spirit to channel its HP into an attack spell. Each spirit has an element-specific skill that deals damage in an area of affect. It deals an additional damage if the target is an Elyos or a Balaur. Stigma Skill
Water Spirit: Magical Water Strike Wind Spirit: Magical Wind Strike Earth Spirit: Magical Earth Strike Fire Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Magma Spirit: Magical Earth Strike

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_CallCompanion_G1_Desc

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_LightningShot_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_ReflectSignet_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_StunBurst_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_StormSlash_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_VenomStab_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_BreakPower_G4_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a stumbled target, and decreases its [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. While the skill is in effect, your [%e0.KN_BreakPower_G3_Buff.e1.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e0.KN_BreakPower_G3_Buff.e1.StatUp.Value]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Light_EternalServent_G2_DESC
string.body: Summons a holy spirit near you. This spirit does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts [%e0.EternalServent_G2.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] long-range fire damage on a selected target within a 30m radius. This spirit vanishes after a while and consumes its HP with each attack. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_JumpingCut_DESC

This Mirror remains at the incantation point and deals [%e0.HolyServent_G1.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] long-range magic fire damage to a specified target within a 25m radius. This Mirror disappears after a certain time and loses HP with every attack.

The crystal vanishes after a certain time and consumes its own HP with each attack.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Light_HolySilika_G2_DESC
string.body: Summons a Divine Mirror near you. This mirror does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts [%e0.HolyServent_G2.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] ranged magical fire damage on a selected target within a 25 m radius. The mirror vanishes after a certain time and consumes its HP with each attack.
